filters.name: Filter unblocking search ads and self-promotion
filters.description: Filter that unblocks searches (Duckduckgo, Google, Bing, Yahoo) and self-promo ads. Self-promotion definition: When an ad on a website is promoting this very website or other websites/social media/etc. closely related to it, such an ad is considered a self-promoting one.
